name: reverse_index_at_region_top
description: Reverse index (ESC M) at top of scroll region scrolls content down within region
comment: CSI 2;4 r (region rows 1-3), CUP(2,1) -> (1,0), print A at (1,0), CUP(2,1) -> (1,0) again, ESC M reverse index at region top: blank line at (1,0), A moves to (2,0); cursor at (1,0)
